Package control

Class CourseManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • control.CourseManager
  • public class CourseManager
extends java.lang.Object
    CourseManager handles the input and ouput of data into the different entity courses.
    Author:
    Jasper Lim

        public static Course findCourseObject​(java.lang.String courseID)

        Returns:

        Searches for a list of indexes that a course has.
        Parameters:
        courseID - of a course eg. CZ2001
        Returns:

        Parameters:
        Student - Student Object
        courseID - of a course eg. CZ2001

      • addStudentToWaitlist

        public boolean addStudentToWaitlist​(Student student,
                                    java.lang.String CourseID,
                                    java.lang.String indexID)
        Adds a student to the waitlist of a course and index.
        Parameters:
        student - Object containing attributes of a student
        CourseID - of a course eg. CZ2001
        indexID - of a index belonging to a course eg. 10124
        Returns:
        boolean indicating if the student has successfully entered the waitlist.

      • removeStudentFromWaitlist

        public Student removeStudentFromWaitlist​(java.lang.String CourseID,
                                         java.lang.String indexID)
        remove a student from the waitlist.
        Parameters:
        CourseID - of a course eg. CZ2001
        indexID - of a index belonging to a course eg. 10124
        Returns:
        Student object that has been dropped from the waitlist.

        courseID - of a course eg. CZ2001
        indexID - of a index belonging to a course eg. 10124
